data.name: BasicSettingsDescription.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up the basic settings for your message.

data.name: plRoles.Help
data.value: You can select the User Roles that are to receive this message. eg All Administrators, or all Registered Users.

data.name: plEmail.Help
data.value: You can add Email addresses, separated by a ";".

data.name: plFrom.Help
data.value: Enter the 'From' email address of the email message.

data.name: revEmailAddress.ErrorMessage
data.value: The email address is in an invalid format!

data.name: plSubject.Help
data.value: Enter the subject of this message.

data.name: MessageDescription.Text
data.value: You can use the Editor below to write your message.

data.name: AdvancedSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up the advanced settings for your message.

data.name: plAttachment.Help
data.value: Select an Attachment for this message.

data.name: plPriority.Help
data.value: Select the priority for this message.

data.name: plSendMethod.Help
data.value: Select the method for this email to be sent.

data.name: SendTo.Text
data.value: TO: One Message Per Email Address ( Personalized )

data.name: SendBCC.Text
data.value: BCC: One Email To Blind Distribution List ( Not Personalized )

data.name: plSendAction.Help
data.value: Select how you want the message to be sent.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Newsletters

Administrators can send bulk email to all users belonging to a particular Role.
